HOT! Update Content:
●New Slot Game: SAYURI
- 3x5 Reels, 243 Ways!
- New Free Game Feature: Diverse Free Game choices. Choose your Free Spin times!
- High WILD Multiplier: Multiple your winnings up to x30 with WILD in Free Game!
- Mystery Feature: Discover SAYURI’s secret!

More!
●Added Ocean Boss in Ocean King 2
●Added a Lobby for Ocean King 2
●Upgraded Daily Bonus Feature
●Optimized PK Tournament
●Optimized In-Game Tournament

Enjoy the whole new features!

HOT! Update Content:
●New Slot: HomeRunBaseball
Hit a Home Run and win SUPER WIN!
- 3x5 Reels, 50 Pay lines. Exciting background music and virtual game scene. Experience the game like in a stadium!
- Random Fire Ball WILD! Hit it and you'll be the MVP!
- 10~30 Free Spin opportunities with more Fire Ball WILDs!

More…
●Anniversary Special Events!
●Optimized PK Tournament and bug fixed
●Optimized Ocean King 2 In-game Tournament
●Added special fish into Ocean King 2
